hero.core_tension: Choosing where to invest limited ops and creative energy: run an earlier 2–4 week holiday test (S1) versus a parade-weekend activation (S2), while protecting margin with targeted discounts (S5) and sizing a branded pop-up (S3). The image should convey that split-second resource tradeoff and scheduling urgency without literal clocks.
hero.setting: Flagship back-of-house adjacent to a polished storefront — visible shopfront glass and a worktable in the foreground
hero.persona: Store operations lead collaborating with a studio creative director and a merch planner
hero.action: Leaning over a glossy mockup table, exchanging printed play cards and fabric swatches, pointing at a tiered promo card stack
hero.urgency_symbol: Staggered warm-to-cool light bands cast across the table and layered ribbon-like paper strips that narrow from left-to-right to suggest an earlier-to-peak timing window
props: Printed play cards labeled S1–S5 (behavioral, cultural, market, tech, discount)
A/B test matrices on matte paper
Brass pins and acetate overlays (studio material cues)
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights on faces and hands, soft falloff into clean negative space
hero.alt: Two people — a store operations lead and a studio creative director — lean over a glossy table in a flagship back room, pointing at printed play cards labeled S1 through S5 and sample packaging; warm-to-cool light bands fall across the table to symbolize narrowing timing choices, with the storefront glass visible in soft focus behind them.

signal_map.structure: Concentric arcs and intersecting rings that place signals on a timeline-arc (early window → parade weekend → post-holiday), with a central lattice anchoring operational KPIs
elements: Folded paper tokens labeled S1, S2, S3, S4, S5
Curved path lines connecting tokens (trade-off vectors)
Pinned material samples (paper, brass, frosted glass) at key nodes
Small metric tokens (conversion, AOV, footfall) as matte discs
signal_map.motion: Gentle left-to-right pull: S1 arcs drawn slightly forward, S2 peaks mid-arc, S3 sits as a lateral popup node; directional light and subtle shadow pulls imply reallocation of effort and spend
signal_map.palette: Matte charcoal base with warm gold highlights and cool blue accents; materials include matte paper, brushed brass pins, and frosted glass tokens
signal_map.alt: A tabletop signal map made of concentric arcs and pins: folded tokens labeled S1–S5 sit on interconnected paths, with gold highlights on earlier arcs and a blue peak near the parade-weekend node; metric discs for conversion and footfall are pinned at key intersections.
